name: Legal Notice - Consumer Complaint
description: Legal notice for consumer grievances and deficiency in service
body: LEGAL NOTICE UNDER CONSUMER PROTECTION ACT
Subject: Notice for Deficiency in Service/Defective Product

body.text: Under instructions from and on behalf of my client {{consumer_name}}, I hereby serve upon you the following legal notice:
I, {{consumer_name}}, consumer, hereby serve upon you the following legal notice:

body: 1. That on {{purchase_date}}, {{product_service}} was purchased/availed from your establishment for a sum of ₹{{amount_paid}}.

body.text: 2. That the said transaction is evidenced by Invoice/Bill No. {{invoice_number}}.

body: 3. That the said product/service was found to be defective/deficient in the following manner: {{deficiency_description}}.

body.text: 4. That complaint regarding the said deficiency/defect was first made on {{complaint_date}}, but despite assurances, the deficiency has not been rectified.

body: 5. That the aforesaid deficiency/defect amounts to unfair trade practice and deficiency in service under the Consumer Protection Act, 2019.
6. That the consumer has suffered mental agony, physical harassment, and financial loss due to the said deficiency.

body.text: (c) Pay compensation of ₹{{compensation_sought}} for mental agony, harassment, and loss of time;

body: (d) The above within 15 (fifteen) days from the receipt of this notice.

TAKE NOTICE that if you fail to comply with the above demands within the stipulated period, the consumer shall be constrained to file a complaint before the appropriate Consumer Forum under the Consumer Protection Act, 2019, claiming refund, replacement, compensation, and costs, without any further reference to you.
This notice is issued without prejudice to all other rights and remedies available under law.
